001package org.eldependenci.rpc;
002
003import org.eldependenci.rpc.protocol.RPCRequester;
004import org.eldependenci.rpc.protocol.RPCServiceable;
005
006public interface RPCInstallation {
007
008    void retrofits(Class<?>... services);
009
010    void remotes(Class<?>... services);
011
012    void serves(Class<?>... serves);
013
014    void registerProtocol(String protocolName, Class<? extends RPCServiceable> serviceable, Class<? extends RPCRequester> requester);
015
016
017}
